        public void addItem(java.lang.String path,
                    java.lang.String id,
                    int x,
                    int y,
                    int size,
                    int rad,
                    int val)
        adds an item to the room
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the image of the item
        id - the id of the item
        x - the x coordinate of the item
        y - the y coordinate of the item
        size - the size of the item
        rad - the radius of the item's hitbox (prompt box)
        val - what value to use in fillPromptGrid()

      • removeItem

        removes an item from the room
        Parameters:
